about_the_game:
This is a Horizontal exploration horror suspense puzzle game. You can move the character with the A and D keys, explore the scene, and communicate with other characters
A sudden astronomical vision locked you and the whole school in a remote research institute
A mysterious society has sprung up with ties to your missing girlfriend, who seem to be stuck in some sort of religion
In order to find your girlfriend, you have to step into the darkness of the night research institute, explore the secrets buried in the research institute, meet girls wandering at night, and encounter unspeakable horrors... until the moment when the truth comes

The game is a Cthulhu horror game, the main gameplay is exploration and decryption.
Game contains:
Rich and dynamic action and plot screen interpretation effect
Thrilling, suspenseful and exciting game plot
Thrilling action-adventure experience
Moderately brain-burning fun puzzles

The text of the demo version and the official release version may be slightly different, but the gameplay and performance are basically the same. The demo version is about one-sixth the length of the official version. If you like this gameplay and are interested in the story, please buy the official version.

content_descriptors.notes:
The characters in the game are over 18 years old.
caution
The game has a Cthulhu religious background, and the game content contains hints of weird sexual behavior, and the game plot may contain descriptions of non-consensual behavior.
The game also contains violence and gore that may not be suitable for all audiences.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 800 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
